definitions.definition: A citizen of a borough or town, especially one belonging to the middle class .

subdefinitions.definition: A member of the medieval mercantile class .
A citizen of a medieval city.

definitions.definition: A prosperous member of the community ; a middle-class citizen (may connote complacency ).

main_definition: A citizen of a borough or town, especially one belonging to the middle class .
secondary_definitions: A prosperous member of the community ; a middle-class citizen (may connote complacency ).
